entries.journal_entry_description: An Imperial Star Destroyer has gone renegade. You have been drafted to get it back for the Empire.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Travel to the escape pod from the Star Destroyer and investigate. It is on Yavin IV.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Reconfigure the flight recorder so that you learn what information it holds.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The flight recorder reveals that former Imperial Captain Sait has taken control of the Star Destroyer and seeks to sell it to the Black Sun.
entries.task03_message_box_text: The flight recorder reveals that former Imperial Captain Sait has taken control of the Star Destroyer and seeks to sell it to the Black Sun.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Those Black Sun scoundrels must know where the Star Destroyer has been taken. Go to one of their bases and convince them to share that information with you.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: "Those Black Sun scoundrels must know where the Star Destroyer has been taken. Go to one of their bases and convince them to share that information with you."
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Captain Sait is looking to sell the Star Destroyer to the Black Sun. Go to a Black Sun stronghold on Endor and fight Black Sun members there until you find a datapad revealing the location of the renegade Star Destroyer.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return to Aurilia and speak with Major Appleton.
